comments.raw_text:
The following site gets in a refresh loop:

http://windowslivehelp.com/thread.aspx?postid=7825ED88-D166-4E6A-9AB9-74CCD80B2765#7825ED88-D166-4E6A-9AB9-74CCD80B2765

I can replicate in Firefox 8+ but it doesn't happen in Firefox 3.6 or WebKit browsers.

This was reported in SUMO https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/906207
